Joyce Grant (23 Jenụwarị 1924 na 11 Julaị 2006) bụ onye na-eme ihe nkiri na UK nke South Africa nke a maara maka ọrụ ya na-atọ ọchị
A mụrụ Grant na Bloemfontein, South Africa ma nna ya gbara ya ume ịkwaga London iji mụọ ime ihe nkiri
Mgbe ọ laghachiri South Africa, ọrụ ya gụnyere: "Lola" na William Inge's Come Back Little Sheba na dịka "Laura Wingfield" na Tennessee Williams' The Glass Menagerie
Na ngwụcha afọ 1950 ọ laghachiri na London kpamkpam wee pụta na: The Happy Apple, Something Áfoot, The Club, Deathtrap na Tonight at Eight-thirty
Na telivishọn ọ nọ na Gideon's Way "Olee otu esi ezumike nká n'enweghị ezigbo ọrụ".
Ọ pụtara na egwu TV Pickwick maka BBC n'afọ 1969 ma soro Frankie Howerd na Broadway na Rockefeller na Red Indians

N'afọ 1980 ọ pụtara na ihe omume mbụ nke Hi-de-Hi! na-eme nne Jeffrey Fairbrother.N'afọ 1987, Joyce ghọrọ onye otu The National Theatre Company, na-apụta na mmepụta atọ, Ting Tang Mine, Fathers and Sons na Six Characters in Search of an Author
N'afọ 1988, ọ rụrụ ọrụ Aunt Em/Glinda na Royal Shakespeare Company's The Wizard of Oz na Mother Superior na Black Adder S1E3-The Archbishop

Mgbe ọ lara ezumike nká n'ọkwa, ọ ghọrọ "enyi" ndị ọrịa HIV+ na Lighthouse na London ma gosipụta ya na foto Lewis Morley abụọ na National Portrait Gallery.
Joyce Grant nwụrụ na 11 Julaị 2006, site na ọrịa kansa, mgbe ọ dị afọ 82.
